solution_line_template: First find the total number of stocking stuffers one kid gets: {candy_canes_per_kid} candy canes + {beanie_babies_per_kid} beanie babies + {books_per_kid} book = <<{candy_canes_per_kid}+{beanie_babies_per_kid}+{books_per_kid}={stuffers_per_kid}>>{stuffers_per_kid} stocking stuffers

Then multiply the number of stocking stuffers per kid by the number of kids to find the total number: {stuffers_per_kid} stocking stuffers/kid * {num_kids} kids = <<{stuffers_per_kid}*{num_kids}={total_stuffers}>>{total_stuffers} stocking stuffers
